overview: The sheriff of a small Georgia town on the edge of the Okefenokee Swamp does nothing to stop a family of white-trash moonshiners from trapping and killing defenseless animals. But Sammy, a young swamp-boy, takes matters into his own hands. Assisted by his pet chimp, Chuck, Sammy launches a campaign to free the trapped animals.
tagline: THE HILARIOUS ADVENTURES OF A MODERN DAY TOM SAWYER...
title: The Tender Warrior
